snippet.title: IRON MEAT Release Date and Physical Game Trailer
snippet.description:
IRON MEAT IS OUT NOW FOR ALL PLATFORMS:
🖥️ Steam: https://bit.ly/IronMeatSteam
🔴 Nintendo Switch: https://bit.ly/IronMeatNintendo
🔵 PlayStation: https://bit.ly/IronMeatPlayStation
🟢 Xbox: https://bit.ly/IronMeatXbox
🎮 Physical Edition: https://bit.ly/IronMeatPhysical
🟤 Epic Games: https://bit.ly/IronMeatEpic
🟡 Itch: https://bit.ly/IronMeatItchio
🟣 GOG: https://bit.ly/IronMeatGOG
🟠 VK Play: https://bit.ly/IronMeatVKplay

GET PHYSICAL GAME HERE ⬇️
https://www.strictlylimitedgames.com/collections/iron-meat

Sign up for email updates: https://bit.ly/IronMeatEmail

Iron Meat is a run-and-gun arcade shooter that immerses players in an apocalyptic future overrun by "The Meat," an iron-ravenous mass mutating everything in its path. Blast your way through retro-inspired stages and bosses to uncover the shocking horrors behind secret experiments on the Moon. Coming September 26th to ALL current and last-gen platforms, and physically the same day, for the Nintendo Switch and Sony PlayStation 5. Stay tuned for updates!

Co-Developed and Published by Retroware
https://retroware.com/
https://twitter.com/retroware

Developed and Programmed by Ivan Valeryevich Suvorov
https://twitter.com/ivanmeat

Trailer Produced by Justin Silverman
http://justysilverman.com
https://twitter.com/JustySilverman

Voice over by Alex T.

2D Animation by Jaime Rodriguez
https://twitter.com/JaimeR_2D
https://www.youtube.com/@JaimeR2D/

Key art by Marieke Douma:
https://twitter.com/MKDouma6
https://www.artstation.com/mkdouma6

Trailer Edited by Queue
https://x.com/Queue_SS

Graphics by Joe La Scola
https://twitter.com/joelascola/
https://www.josephlascola.com/

#IronMeat #indiegames #retrogaming #indiegame #contra #retroware #retrogames
